userStories.title: Expose getToolReviews in Data Layer
acceptanceCriteria: Ensure there is a function 'getToolReviews(region: string)' that returns an array of ToolReview objects
If it doesn't exist, create it (it should read from src/data/regions/[region]/en/reviews/tools/)
Ensure the return type matches ToolReview[]

acceptanceCriteria: Fetch tool reviews alongside existing articles (if any)

postFeatureReview.summary: Fixed Bettor Resources page to properly display tool reviews. Added getToolReviews alias for cleaner API. Tool reviews now link correctly to /tools/ route.
postFeatureReview.impact: bettor-resources page now shows Live Score Apps guide. Links route correctly: tools → /tools/, articles → /guides/.

postFeatureReview.recommendations: Consider adding a visual distinction (badge/tag) between 'Tool Reviews' and 'Guides' on the listing page.
